node.detail_zh: 患者為 3 個月大男嬰，為長興大廈 2 樓及 9 樓宿舍負責人的家人，無外遊記錄，沒有病徵。
node.detail_en: The patient is a 3-month-old baby boy. He is a family member of the person in charge of the dormitories on the 2nd and 9th floor in Cheong Hing Mansion, Mong Kok. He has no recent travel history and has no symptoms.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 長興大廈 2 樓及 9 樓外傭宿舍
groups.name_en: Cheong Hing Mansion Boarding Houses for Domestic Helpers
groups.description_zh: 屬同一負責人位於長興大廈 2 樓及 9 樓的宿舍，有曾入住印傭及負責人的家人先後確診。
groups.description_en: The two boarding houses for domestic helpers on 2/F and 9/F, Cheong Hing Mansion are both managed by the same person. Confirmed cases include Indonesian domestic helpers who resided there and family members of the boarding houses manager.
